unnormalised: Hey everyone! Training regimens are so crucial, right? Like, look at PV Sindhu’s rigorous badminton practice at the Gopichand Academy. It's insane! Remember how much she focused on footwork and endurance? My cousin, Rohan, is training for the Mumbai Marathon, running at least 10 km every other day. Dr. Sharma, his coach, has him lifting weights and doing yoga. He even built a small gym in his 500 sq ft apartment! It all costs Rs. a lot, but hopefully, it's worth it.
